|brand = Linksys |model = BEFVP41 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/06/2011 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Linksys_BEFVP41_v2.0 |series = BEFVP41 |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Samsung;S3C2510;ARM 0506, SAMSUNG, S3C2510A01, K9C09; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM940T |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 166 <!-- 166 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV800B-T; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = 166 MHz |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM638325TS-6; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Infineon;ADM6996L; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:14:BF
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 5-pin header,, CN5 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, CN4
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2004 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00005Y7DQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The [https://homesupport.cisco.com/en-eu/support/routers/BEFVP41/ Linksys BEFVP41] (hardware version 2 in case) is an "EtherFast Cable/DSL VPN Router with 4-port switch".
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.randomprojects.org/wiki/Linksys_BEFVP41 ''Linksys BEFVP41'' on '''RandomProjects''' wiki] (PCB images)
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Linksys befvp41 0.preview.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== ===Hardware=== *CPU: [http://www.datasheetcatalog.org/datasheet2/5/0wfxot81suhqc9wzx5e6qy3kh07y.pdf Samsung S3C2510A01] (0506 K9C09) ARM940T *Flash: 8M-bit [1M x8/512K x16] CMOS Single Voltage 3V only (NOR) : :[http://www.dataman.com/media/datasheet/Macronix/MX29LV800B-T.pdf Macronix MX29LV800BBTC-90] (S04431 2K571900) *RAM: 2M x 32 Synchronous DRAM (SDRAM), 166 MHz: :[http://doc.chipfind.ru/pdf/etron/em638325ts6.pdf EtronTech EM638325TS-6] (I470803RJJ870.1) *Switch: 6x port 10/100 Mbps Single Chip Ethernet Switch Controller: :[http://www.datasheetcatalog.org/datasheets2/17/1785381_1.pdf Infineon ADM6996L] (AA0451 HSS430007.1SL) *Trans: 10/100 Base-T Ethernet Isolation Transformer: :[http://www.bothhandusa.com/products/100BaseT/TS6121CX-RevA5-020903.pdf BothHand-USA TS6121CX] (0510S) *Quad 2-input AND gate: [http://doc.chipfind.ru/pdf/philips/74lvc08ad.pdf Philips 74LVC08AD] (AP844 06 UnG04496) *PMU: 150KHz, 3A PWM Buck DC/DC Converter: [http://www.datasheetcatalog.org/datasheets2/18/187340_1.pdf AnaChip AP1501-33] *PMU: 1A Low Dropout Positive Adjustable or Fixed-Mode Regulator: :[http://www.shsiyue.com/chips/data/ap1117.pdf AnaChip AP1117] (4LA) *10 MHz crystal (for S3C2510A01): TXC BAy27 10.000 MHz *25 MHz crystal (for ADM6996L): 25.0 MHz F4M *2x YCL PH202484 (0409)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
